content: wine cork trees by corina irvine supplies ● two strands of fingering weight yarn or 1 strand of worsted weight yarn approximately 3 grams ● double-pointed needles or circular needles magic loop size 4mm us 6 recommended ● removable stitch marker ● darning needle to weave in ends ● a wine cork needle size 4mm us 6 double pointed needles or similar to achieve gauge if you generally knit tighter 4mm will work otherwise drop to 3 5 mm us 4 you ll only need 3 needles if using double-pointed needles gauge abbreviations stitch gauge is 5 stitches over 1 row gauge is k2tog knit two together not important if you re having trouble getting ssk slip slip knit gauge then leave a long enough cast on tail to cinch up the base around the cork afterwards pattern copyright © 2023 corina irvine published november 2023 all rights reserved do not copy or distribute page 1 o f 2 wine cork trees by corina irvine written instructions finishing cast on using a long tail cast on with a 12 tail cut yarn with at least a 6 tail and thread cast on 16 stitches split the stitches between through the remaining 4 stitches secure ends two double-pointed needles 8 each side mark on the inside of the tree the beginning of the round with a removable weave in cast on edge tail using the cork to stitch marker adjust the fit and tighten the cast on stitches if row 1 - 4 knit they re a little loose find the flat side of your row 5 purl cork and make sure that s sticking out your tree row 6 - 8 knit as the base so the tree will stand optionally row 9 purl add a loop of yarn to the top of your tree if you row 10 - 12 knit want to make it a hanging ornament row 13 purl row 14 *k2tog knit 2* repeat * * across stitches stitch count 12 row 15 and 16 knit all stitches row 17 purl all stitches row 18 knit all stitches row 19 *k2tog knit 1* repeat * * across stitches stitch count 8 row 20 *k2tog * repeat * * across stitches stitch count 4 skip to the finishing section chart pattern copyright © 2023 corina irvine published november 2023 all rights reserved do not copy or distribute page 2 o f 2
